title: Ticket #6132: Whitespace significant in VMPARAM_vm_disk
description:
The default awk script that the vm_gahp calls to generate the XML description for libvirt is sensitive to whitespace surrounding the commas in VMPARAM_vm_disk. The result is invalid parameters (including the disk filenames) in the XML description, leading to libvirt being unable to start the VM.

Before 8.5.5, most users weren't affected by this, as condor_submit modified the vm_disk value to remove spaces around the commas. As part of #4167, condor_submit started leaving the vm_disk untouched.

Possible fixes:

  • Modify the default awk script (libvirt_simple_script.awk) to ignore these spaces.
  • Have condor_submit and/or condor_vm-gahp modify the VMPARAM_vm_disk attribute in the job ad to remove these spaces.
  • Stop using the default awk script.
